Hey,

 so I was wondering what the upload size restrictions are on textadventures.co.uk. if there are any. Just curious because I recently tried uploading a version of RotSM and it didn't seem to be working at all.

I know it says: 
"When you click the "Upload" button below, please leave your browser to upload the file, even if doesn't seem to be doing anything. You will see a confirmation message when your file has been successfully uploaded."

Even with that being said though it seems to not be loading at all. I think it might be due to the size of the upload because of my resource files (music and pictures). Once I removed them from the zip folder and uploaded only the games asl file it worked fine.

I don't know off the top of my head if there is a restriction, but basic HTTP uploads can be problematic with large files. I probably should implement a more modern file uploader which will give some feedback, because a normal file upload doesn't give you any indication that it's doing anything.

As a workaround I can manually add large games for you if you submit them via some other means.
